title: Escape (4R300)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Vitality:	+1
Game Text:	Stealth. Bearer must be an unbound Hobbit. Limit 1 per character. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to cancel a skirmish involving him. Any Shadow player may remove (1) to prevent this.
Lore:	“Suddenly Merry and Pippin realized that without moving they were now outside the circle….”
Rarity:	R
